title: Toddler finds mom's gun, shoots her
content:
LOUISVILLE, KY (WAVE) - A woman is charged with wanton endangerment, accused of allowing a toddler to have access to a handgun.
On Feb. 12, Jessica Barkley, 30, place a loaded 9 mm in her nightstand, according to a criminal summons.
Barkley's two-year-old son opened the drawer and grabbed the gun. He then pointed the gun at Barkley and shot her, police said.
+ SLIDESHOW: Mugshot Roundup - March 2016
Barkley was treated at University of Louisville Hospital.
The toddler was removed from Barkley's custody a few days later.
